flowRoot.flowPara: Define initial search space for the nonlinear regressors and construct Φ(ξk)
PC-NARX metamodel for the prediction or simulation of any y[t,ξj]
Orthogonalization of Φ(ξk) and selection of the most significant nonlinear regressors (forward regression scheme)
Selection of the most significant PC basis functions (genetic algorithm scheme)
Define initial search space for the PC basis
Estimation of the coefficients of projection (prediction error or simulation error method)
